name: PredicatedCollection_addTest
description: Unit tests for the add method of PredicatedCollection, ensuring elements are added based on a predicate.

test_cases.name: testAddValidElement
test_cases.description: Tests the addition of a valid element to the PredicatedCollection when the predicate allows it.

test_cases.name: testAddInvalidElement
test_cases.description: Tests the addition of an invalid element to the PredicatedCollection when the predicate rejects it, expecting an IllegalArgumentException.
